page.title: 14My Dad's Job - a Fisherman
page.content: Winter My dad is a fisherman. In the winter he goes trawling to catch sprats. He has three boats and takes them 3-5 miles out. They are called Che Sara, Two Sisters and Girl Alison. It's fun when I go out and help him but it is hard work. Summer In the summer he goes crabbing and netting but the boats go pleasure boating. This year my Dad has tried something new. He has gone seine netting up the river. I help him pull in the net which is hard because you have to battle against the tide. It is always calm up the river though. I have to row the boat sometimes and this is hard work too.
